Lost Gestrals.location: Esquie's Nest – just south of the entrance
Stone Wave Cliffs – on the right path past Bourgeon miniboss
White Tree – on the island east of entrance (requires swim)
Monoco's Station – between two trees by station entrance
Coastal Cave – on a beach above the cave (requires swim)
Red Island – behind two mimes on the red island near Old Lumiere
The Reacher – below its entrance (requires fly)
Endless Night Sanctuary – in red forest outside entrance (requires fly)
Endless Tower – on floating island next to tower (requires fly)

Manor Doors.details: Found near a cliffside in Flying Waters, close to the spawn point. Look for a small ruined building.
Located behind the waterfall in Gestral Village. You'll need to loop around to access the hidden cave entrance.
On the right-hand pathway past the Bourgeon miniboss. It’s tucked behind some trees overlooking the water.
Near the red bridge area. The door is beside a collapsed arch near the lake.
At the edge of the forest before entering the eerie visage zone. Look for the playground structure near a statue.
Found near the upper waterfall path in Sirene. Follow the stream until you see a cracked mirror on the wall.
On a platform below the main elevator room. You must glide or drop down to reach it safely.
Hidden in a small clearing past the central lake. Requires careful navigation through tight foliage.
Located in a frozen cavern at the base of the waterfall. Follow the icy path and look for cracked ice walls.
Reached via flying. Land on the large floating island north of the cliffs. The door is hidden behind a tree.
On a platform just below the main entrance. Glide down from the Reacher peak and check the rocks below.
Fly to the isolated southeast island. The door is hidden behind a pillar with vines near the cliff edge.
After placing the Family Canvas in the Manor, a hidden room opens behind the dining hall fireplace.

Mimes.details: To the right of the stage, past the market as you head down to the harbour. This is the only missable Mime.
Past the Grand Meadow flag, follow the left cliff path to a circular platform between broken pillars.
East of the Coral Cave flag, turn right past the colossal Nevron, pass through seaweed to find the Mime.
From the Sanctuary Maze flag, take right path under a rock hut—Mime is behind the broken hut.
Ahead of Esquie’s Nest entrance, drop down into the crater to find the Mime.
Near Harvester’s Hollow flag, head through the rock alcove to a small cave with the Mime.
From Iced Heart flag, grapple up frozen train path past merchant — Mime is near boxes.
From Right Street flag, follow the fading man, grapple up ledges to Mime on the upper level.
On the red‑tree island SW of Visages, two Mimes stand together holding hands.
From Joyous Vale flag, head left to cliff edge and search behind a tree for the Mime.
Just before Sewing Atelier, up the stairs, mime hides in a dark alcove.
Past Tainted Cliffs flag—descend the rope near altar to find Mime flanked by two Nevrons.
From Ladder Area flag, descend the rope to a lower platform where the Mime awaits.
After Central Plaza flag, ride elevator, cross bridge, descend rope to reach Mime above.
Past the Chroma Portal; this is the hardest Mime—found at the cave's other end.

Music Records.name: Clea! Don't Pull Your Sister's Hair!
Nocturne pour un masque de tristesse
Renoir
Music Records.location: The Manor (Sink near Old Lumière Entrance)

Music Records.name: Until Next Life
Music Records.location: Falling Leaves (After Scavenger Boss + Young Boy)

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Aline
Journal Entries.details: Enter The Manor from the entrance in the Tainted Battlefield in The Monolith to reach the Garden, Journal - Aline can be found by the statue in the center.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 34
Journal Entries.details: Requires Esquie's swim or fly ability to reach the location. Can be found to the right of the Entrance Expedition Flag.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 35
Journal Entries.details: Can be found next to the bridge leading to the Chromatic Ballet within the Resinveil Grove.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 36
Journal Entries.details: Found to the right at the base of the tree upon entering White Tree.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 37
Journal Entries.details: Requires Esquie's fly ability to reach the gestral beach.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 38
Journal Entries.details: From Harvester's Hollow Flag walk down towards the area. Before jumping down turn right to see a slope which you can walk up to an elevated area.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 39
Journal Entries.details: In the Sadness Vale area, after picking up the Energy Tint Shard, head to the other path and climb up the ledge to find the journal.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 40
Journal Entries.details: Exit Sirene and swim toward The Monolith, after watching the cutscene and breaking the barrier, pick up the journal in the upper left corner of the isle.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 41
Journal Entries.details: In the Battlefield section, go to the trenches on the right side of the Fading Woman. On the left side is a small area containing the journal.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 42
Journal Entries.details: From the Manor Gardens Flag, walk straight along the garden wall to reach a path. Follow it, take the rope down, defeat the enemy and pick up the journal.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 43
Journal Entries.details: Found in an abandoned expedition camp on an island northeast of the Coastal Cave. Requires Esquie and the ability to destroy coral reefs.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 44
Journal Entries.details: From Harvester's Hollow Flag, go left past the slope. Found in front of a corpse holding a lit lamp.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 45
Journal Entries.details: After defeating the Giant Sapling, take the left fork in the tunnel to find it at the end.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 46
Journal Entries.details: Located by rubble across the arena where you fight the Chromatic Glissando.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 47
Journal Entries.details: Beside a collapsed structure near the merchant Carnovi.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 48
Journal Entries.details: Exact placement details not provided.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 49
Journal Entries.details: Open the gate behind the boy, continue to the cliff above. Found by broken stairs.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 50
Journal Entries.details: From Paintress Shrine Flag, cross the bridge and take the left path.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 51
Journal Entries.details: From Icebound Train Station, go up the hill and through the crack near the train end.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 52
Journal Entries.details: Located on a narrow path near the Gestral Doctor.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 53
Journal Entries.details: At the end of the path to the left of the Bourgeon.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 54
Journal Entries.details: On the right side of the Arena where you fight the Chromatic Hexga.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 55
Journal Entries.details: From Dancing Classes Flag, go to plaza filled with enemies. Found on the right.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 56
Journal Entries.details: From Entrance Flag, go through broken airship and down left path. Found at base of statue.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 57
Journal Entries.details: After Paint Cage area, find open field and the journal in the middle.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 58
Journal Entries.details: Acquired during cutscene with Lune, Sciel, and Monoco past Left Street Flag.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 59
Journal Entries.details: From Yellow Spire Wrecks Flag, head left into cave to find it in the middle structure.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 60
Journal Entries.details: Outside Opera House, interact with ledge. Esquie retrieves the item (the journal).

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 61
Journal Entries.details: From Foggy Area Flag, go through cave near lit upper field to find it.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 62
Journal Entries.details: Found at a camp on the beach behind Gestral Village.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 63
Journal Entries.details: Near Paint Cage in the Sanctuary Maze at a fork in the path.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 64
Journal Entries.details: Along path left of The Meadows entrance. Requires Esquie's swim ability.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 65
Journal Entries.details: After defeating the Stalact, cross the tracks and turn left.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 66
Journal Entries.details: At a camp on the fork after Esquie joins your party.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 67
Journal Entries.details: Found by boxes after being transported past Crumbling Path Flag.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 68
Journal Entries.details: In Coral Cave at the path with lanterns at the beginning.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 69
Journal Entries.details: In Joyful Vale behind enemies on the left path.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 70
Journal Entries.details: Behind the flower stalls and building after navigating broken streets from Tainted Lumiere Flag.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 78
Journal Entries.details: From Entrance Flag, take top right path. Found on the right at the top.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 81
Journal Entries.details: Acquired in cutscene when Lune and Gustave find Jar.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Expedition 84
Journal Entries.details: On path to the right of the fountain. Requires Esquie’s fly ability.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Julie
Journal Entries.details: Beside collapsed tent west of Forgotten Battlefield. Requires Esquie and ability to Fly.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Renoir
Journal Entries.details: Enter from Old Lumiere, found on nightstand in bedroom after bathroom.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Simon
Journal Entries.details: Found in middle of area after defeating Simon.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Survivor
Journal Entries.details: Inside broken pipe in second field. Use Old Key on gate.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Unknown 1
Journal Entries.details: Inside bedroom accessed from Visages.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Unknown 2
Journal Entries.details: Inside room accessed from The Reacher.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Unknown 3 (The Manor)
Journal Entries.details: Place Manor Family Canvas on empty frame by east wing stairs near Expedition Flag.

Journal Entries.name: Journal - Verso
Journal Entries.details: At foot of destroyed building. Requires Esquie's swim or fly ability.

Pictos.Name: Accelerating Heal
Pictos.Lumina: Healing an ally also applies Rush for 1 turn.

Pictos.Name: Accelerating Last Stand
Pictos.Lumina: Gain Rush if fighting alone.

Pictos.Name: Accelerating Shots
Pictos.Lumina: 20% chance to gain Rush on Free Aim shot.

Pictos.Name: Accelerating Tint
Pictos.Lumina: Healing Tints also apply Rush.

Pictos.Name: Aegis Revival
Pictos.Lumina: +1 Shield on being revived.

Pictos.Name: Anti-Blight
Pictos.Lumina: Immune to Blight.

Pictos.Name: Anti-Burn
Pictos.Lumina: Immune to Burn.

Pictos.Name: Anti-Charm
Pictos.Lumina: Immune to Charm

Pictos.Name: Anti-Freeze
Pictos.Lumina: Immune to Freeze.

Pictos.Name: Anti-Stun
Pictos.Lumina: Immune to Stun

Pictos.Name: At Death's Door
Pictos.Lumina: Deal 50% more damage if Health is below 10%.

Pictos.Name: Attack Lifesteal
Pictos.Lumina: Recover 15% Health on Base Attack.

Pictos.Name: Augmented Aim
Pictos.Lumina: 50% increased Free Aim damage.

Pictos.Name: Augmented Attack
Pictos.Lumina: 50% increased Base Attack damage.

Pictos.Name: Augmented Counter I
Pictos.Lumina: 25% increased Counterattack damage.

Pictos.Name: Augmented Counter II
Pictos.Lumina: 50% increased Counterattack damage.

Pictos.Name: Augmented Counter III
Pictos.Lumina: 75% increased Counterattack damage.

Pictos.Name: Augmented First Strike
Pictos.Lumina: 50% increased damage on the first hit. Once per battle.

Pictos.Name: Auto Death
Pictos.Lumina: Kill self on battle start

Pictos.Name: Auto Powerful
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Powerful for 3 turns on battle start.

Pictos.Name: Auto Regen
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Regen for 3 turns on battle start.

Pictos.Name: Auto Rush
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Rush for 3 turns on battle start.

Pictos.Name: Auto Shell
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Shell for 3 turns on battle start.

Pictos.Name: Base Shield
Pictos.Lumina: +1 Shield if not affected by any Shield on turn start.

Pictos.Name: Beneficial Contamination
Pictos.Lumina: +2 AP on applying a Status Effect. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Break Specialist
Pictos.Lumina: Break damage is increased by 50%, but base damage is reduced by 20%.

Pictos.Name: Breaker
Pictos.Lumina: 25% increased Break damage.

Pictos.Name: Breaking Attack
Pictos.Lumina: Base Attack can Break.

Pictos.Name: Breaking Burn
Pictos.Lumina: 25% increased Break damage on Burning enemies.

Pictos.Name: Breaking Counter
Pictos.Lumina: 50% increased Break damage on Counterattack.

Pictos.Name: Breaking Death
Pictos.Lumina: Fully charge enemy's Break Bar on death.

Pictos.Name: Breaking Shots
Pictos.Lumina: 50% increased Break damage with Free Aim Shots.

Pictos.Name: Breaking Slow
Pictos.Lumina: 25% increased Break damage against Slowed enemies

Pictos.Name: Burn Affinity
Pictos.Lumina: 25% increased damage on Burning Targets.

Pictos.Name: Burning Break
Pictos.Lumina: Apply 3 Burn stacks on Breaking a target.

Pictos.Name: Burning Death
Pictos.Lumina: Apply 3 Burn to all enemies on Death.

Pictos.Name: Burning Mark
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Burn on hitting a Marked enemy.

Pictos.Name: Burning Shots
Pictos.Lumina: 20% chance to Burn on Free Aim shot.

Pictos.Name: Charging Alteration
Pictos.Lumina: +10% of a Gradient Charge on applying a Buff. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Charging Attack
Pictos.Lumina: +15% of a Gradient Charge on Base Attack.

Pictos.Name: Charging Burn
Pictos.Lumina: +20% of Gradient Charge on applying Burn. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Charging Counter
Pictos.Lumina: +10% of a Gradient Charge on Counterattack.

Pictos.Name: Charging Critical
Pictos.Lumina: +20% of a Gradient Charge on Critical Hit. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Charging Mark
Pictos.Lumina: +20% of a Gradient Charge on hitting a Marked target. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Charging Stun
Pictos.Lumina: +5% of a Gradient Charge on hitting a Stunned enemy.

Pictos.Name: Charging Tint
Pictos.Lumina: +5% of a Gradient Charge on using an item.

Pictos.Name: Charging Weakness
Pictos.Lumina: +15% of a Gradient Charge on hitting a Weakness. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Cheater
Pictos.Lumina: Always play twice in a row.

Pictos.Name: Clea's Life
Pictos.Lumina: On turn start, if no damage taken since last turn, recover 100% Health.

Pictos.Name: Cleansing Tint
Pictos.Lumina: Healing Tints also remove all Status Effects from the target.

Pictos.Name: Combo Attack I
Pictos.Lumina: Base Attack has 1 extra hit.

Pictos.Name: Combo Attack II
Pictos.Lumina: Base Attack has 1 extra hit.

Pictos.Name: Combo Attack III
Pictos.Lumina: Base Attack has 1 extra hit.

Pictos.Name: Confident
Pictos.Lumina: Take 50% less damage, but can't be Healed.

Pictos.Name: Confident Fighter
Pictos.Lumina: 30% increased damage, but can't be Healed.

Pictos.Name: Critical Break
Pictos.Lumina: 25% increased Break damage on Critical Hits.

Pictos.Name: Critical Burn
Pictos.Lumina: 25% increased Critical Chance on Burning enemies.

Pictos.Name: Critical Moment
Pictos.Lumina: 50% increased Critical Chance if Health is below 30%.

Pictos.Name: Critical Stun
Pictos.Lumina: 100% Critical Chance on hitting a Stunned target.

Pictos.Name: Critical Vulnerability
Pictos.Lumina: 25% increased Critical Chance on Defenceless enemies.

Pictos.Name: Critical Weakness
Pictos.Lumina: 25% increased Critical Chance on Weakness

Pictos.Name: Dead Energy I
Pictos.Lumina: +3 AP on killing an enemy.

Pictos.Name: Dead Energy II
Pictos.Lumina: +3 AP on killing an enemy.

Pictos.Name: Death Bomb
Pictos.Lumina: On Death, deal damage to all enemies.

Pictos.Name: Defensive Mode
Pictos.Lumina: On receiving damage, consume 1 AP to take 30% less damage, if possible.

Pictos.Name: Dodger
Pictos.Lumina: Gain 1 AP on Perfect Dodge. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Double Burn
Pictos.Lumina: On applying a Burn stack, apply a second one.

Pictos.Name: Double Mark
Pictos.Lumina: Mark requires 1 more hit to be removed.

Pictos.Name: Draining Cleanse
Pictos.Lumina: Consume 1 AP to prevent Status Effects application, if possible.

Pictos.Name: Effective Heal
Pictos.Lumina: Double all Heals received.

Pictos.Name: Effective Support
Pictos.Lumina: +2 AP on using an item.

Pictos.Name: Empowering Attack
Pictos.Lumina: Gain Powerful for 1 turn on Base Attack.

Pictos.Name: Empowering Break
Pictos.Lumina: Gain Powerful on Breaking a target.

Pictos.Name: Empowering Dodge
Pictos.Lumina: 5% increased damage for each consecutive successful Dodge. Can stack up to 10 times.

Pictos.Name: Empowering Last Stand
Pictos.Lumina: Gain Powerful if fighting alone.

Pictos.Name: Empowering Parry
Pictos.Lumina: Each successful Parry increases damage by 5% until end of the following turn. Taking any damage removes this buff.

Pictos.Name: Empowering Tint
Pictos.Lumina: Healing Tints also apply Powerful.

Pictos.Name: Energetic Healer
Pictos.Lumina: +2 AP on Healing an ally. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Energising Attack I
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on Base Attack.

Pictos.Name: Energising Attack II
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on Base Attack.

Pictos.Name: Energising Break
Pictos.Lumina: +3 AP on Breaking a target.

Pictos.Name: Energising Burn
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on applying Burn. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Energising Cleanse
Pictos.Lumina: Dispel the first negative Status Effect received and gain 2 AP.

Pictos.Name: Energising Death
Pictos.Lumina: On death, +4 AP to allies.

Pictos.Name: Energising Gradient
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP per Gradient Charge consumed.

Pictos.Name: Energising Heal
Pictos.Lumina: On Healing an ally, also give 2 AP.

Pictos.Name: Energising Jump
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on Jump Counterattack.

Pictos.Name: Energising Pain
Pictos.Lumina: No longer gain AP on Parry. +1 AP on getting hit.

Pictos.Name: Energising Parry
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on successful Parry.

Pictos.Name: Energising Powerful
Pictos.Lumina: Give 2 AP on applying Powerful.

Pictos.Name: Energising Revive
Pictos.Lumina: +3 AP to all allies when revived.

Pictos.Name: Energising Rush
Pictos.Lumina: Give 2 AP on applying Rush.

Pictos.Name: Energising Shell
Pictos.Lumina: Give 2 AP on applying Shell.

Pictos.Name: Energising Shots
Pictos.Lumina: 20% chance to gain 1 AP on Free Aim shot.

Pictos.Name: Energising Start I
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on battle start.

Pictos.Name: Energising Start II
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on battle start.

Pictos.Name: Energising Start III
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on battle start.

Pictos.Name: Energising Start IV
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on battle start.

Pictos.Name: Energising Stun
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on hitting a Stunned target with a Skill.

Pictos.Name: Energising Turn
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on turn start.

Pictos.Name: Energy Master
Pictos.Lumina: Every AP gain is increased by 1.

Pictos.Name: Enfeebling Attack
Pictos.Lumina: Base Attack applies Powerless for 1 turn.

Pictos.Name: Enfeebling Mark
Pictos.Lumina: Marked targets deal 30% less damage.

Pictos.Name: Exhausting Power
Pictos.Lumina: 50% increased damage if Exhausted.

Pictos.Name: Exposing Attack
Pictos.Lumina: Base Attack applies Defenceless for 1 turn.

Pictos.Name: Exposing Break
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Defenceless on Break.

Pictos.Name: Faster Than Strong
Pictos.Lumina: Always play twice in a row, but deal 50% less damage.

Pictos.Name: First Offensive
Pictos.Lumina: First hit dealt and taken deals 50% more damage.

Pictos.Name: First Strike
Pictos.Lumina: Play first.

Pictos.Name: Fueling Break
Pictos.Lumina: Breaking a target doubles its Burn amount.

Pictos.Name: Full Strength
Pictos.Lumina: 25% increased damage on full Health.

Pictos.Name: Glass Canon
Pictos.Lumina: Deal 25% more damage, but take 25% more damage.

Pictos.Name: Gradient Break
Pictos.Lumina: +50% of a Gradient Charge on Breaking a target.

Pictos.Name: Gradient Breaker
Pictos.Lumina: 50% increased Break damage with Gradient Attacks.

Pictos.Name: Gradient Fighter
Pictos.Lumina: +25% increased damage with Gradient Attacks.

Pictos.Name: Greater Defenceless
Pictos.Lumina: +15% to Defenceless damage amplification.

Pictos.Name: Greater Powerful
Pictos.Lumina: +15% to Powerful damage increase.

Pictos.Name: Greater Powerless
Pictos.Lumina: +15% to Powerless damage reduction.

Pictos.Name: Greater Rush
Pictos.Lumina: +25% to Rush Speed increase.

Pictos.Name: Greater Shell
Pictos.Lumina: +10% to Shell damage reduction.

Pictos.Name: Greater Slow
Pictos.Lumina: +15% to Slow Speed reduction.

Pictos.Name: Healing Boon
Pictos.Lumina: Heal 15% HP on applying a buff.

Pictos.Name: Healing Counter
Pictos.Lumina: Recover 25% Health on Counterattack.

Pictos.Name: Healing Death
Pictos.Lumina: On death, the rest of the Expedition recover all Health.

Pictos.Name: Healing Fire
Pictos.Lumina: Recover 25% Health when attacking a Burning target. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Healing Mark
Pictos.Lumina: Recover 25% Health on hitting a Marked enemy. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Healing Parry
Pictos.Lumina: Recover 3% Health on Parry.

Pictos.Name: Healing Share
Pictos.Lumina: Receive 15% of all Heals affecting other characters.

Pictos.Name: Healing Stun
Pictos.Lumina: Recover 5% Health on hitting a Stunned target.

Pictos.Name: Healing Tint Energy
Pictos.Lumina: Healing Tints also give 1 AP.

Pictos.Name: Immaculate
Pictos.Lumina: 30% increased damage until a hit is received.

Pictos.Name: In Medias Res
Pictos.Lumina: +3 Shields on Battle Start, but max Health is halved.

Pictos.Name: Inverted Affinity
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Inverted on self for 3 turns on battle start. 50% increased damage while Inverted.

Pictos.Name: Last Stand Critical
Pictos.Lumina: 100% Critical Chance while fighting alone.

Pictos.Name: Longer Burn
Pictos.Lumina: Burn duration is increased by 2.

Pictos.Name: Longer Powerful
Pictos.Lumina: On applying Powerful, its duration is increased by 2.

Pictos.Name: Longer Rush
Pictos.Lumina: On applying Rush, its duration is increased by 2.

Pictos.Name: Longer Shell
Pictos.Lumina: On applying Shell, its duration is increased by 2.

Pictos.Name: Marking Break
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Mark on Break.

Pictos.Name: Marking Shots
Pictos.Lumina: 20% chance to apply Mark on Free Aim shot.

Pictos.Name: Painted Power
Pictos.Lumina: Damage can exceed 9,999.

Pictos.Name: Painter
Pictos.Lumina: Convert all Physical damage to Void damage.

Pictos.Name: Perilous Parry
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on Parry, but damage received is doubled.

Pictos.Name: Piercing Shot
Pictos.Lumina: 25% increased Free Aim damage. Free Aim shots ignore Shields.

Pictos.Name: Powered Attack
Pictos.Lumina: On every damage dealt, try to consume 1 AP. If successful, increase damage by 20%.

Pictos.Name: Powerful Heal
Pictos.Lumina: Healing an ally also applies Powerful for 1 turn.

Pictos.Name: Powerful Mark
Pictos.Lumina: Gain Powerful on hitting a Marked enemy.

Pictos.Name: Powerful on Shell
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Powerful on applying Shell.

Pictos.Name: Powerful Revive
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Powerful for 3 turns when revived.

Pictos.Name: Powerful Shield
Pictos.Lumina: 10% increased damage per Shield Point on self.

Pictos.Name: Powerful Shots
Pictos.Lumina: 20% chance to gain Powerful on Free Aim shot.

Pictos.Name: Pro Retreat
Pictos.Lumina: Allows Flee to be instantaneous.

Pictos.Name: Protecting Attack
Pictos.Lumina: Gain Shell for 1 turn on Base Attack.

Pictos.Name: Protecting Death
Pictos.Lumina: On death, allies gain Shell.

Pictos.Name: Protecting Heal
Pictos.Lumina: Healing an ally also applies Shell for 1 turn.

Pictos.Name: Protecting Last Stand
Pictos.Lumina: Gain Shell if fighting alone.

Pictos.Name: Protecting Tint
Pictos.Lumina: Healing Tints also apply Shell.

Pictos.Name: Quick Break
Pictos.Lumina: Play again on Breaking a target.

Pictos.Name: Random Defense
Pictos.Lumina: Damage taken is randomly multiplied by a value between 50% and 200%.

Pictos.Name: Recovery
Pictos.Lumina: Recovers 10% Health on turn start.

Pictos.Name: Rejuvenating Revive
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Regen for 3 turns when revived.

Pictos.Name: Revive Paradox
Pictos.Lumina: Play immediately when revived.

Pictos.Name: Revive Tint Energy
Pictos.Lumina: Revive Tints also give 3 AP.

Pictos.Name: Rewarding Mark
Pictos.Lumina: +2 AP on dealing damage to a Marked target. Once per turn.

Pictos.Name: Roulette
Pictos.Lumina: Every hit has a 50% chance to deal either 50% or 200% of its damage.

Pictos.Name: Rush on Powerful
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Rush on applying Powerful.

Pictos.Name: Second Chance
Pictos.Lumina: Revive with 100% Health. Once per battle.

Pictos.Name: Shared Care
Pictos.Lumina: When healing an ally, also Heal self for 50% of that value.

Pictos.Name: Shell On Rush
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Shell on applying Rush.

Pictos.Name: Shield Affinity
Pictos.Lumina: 30% increased damage while having Shields, but receiving any damage always removes all Shields.

Pictos.Name: Shielding Death
Pictos.Lumina: On death, allies gain 3 Shield points.

Pictos.Name: Shielding Tint
Pictos.Lumina: Healing Tints also add 2 Shields.

Pictos.Name: Shortcut
Pictos.Lumina: Immediately play when falling below 30% Health. Once per battle.

Pictos.Name: Slowing Break
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Slow on Break.

Pictos.Name: Sniper
Pictos.Lumina: First Free Aim shot each turn deals 200% increased damage and can Break.

Pictos.Name: Solidifying
Pictos.Lumina: +2 Shields when the character's Health falls below 50%. Once per battle.

Pictos.Name: Solo Fighter
Pictos.Lumina: Deal 50% more damage if fighting alone.

Pictos.Name: SOS Power
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Powerful when falling below 50% Health.

Pictos.Name: SOS Rush
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Rush when falling below 50% Health.

Pictos.Name: SOS Shell
Pictos.Lumina: Apply Shell when falling below 50% Health.

Pictos.Name: Staggering Attack
Pictos.Lumina: 50% increased Break damage on Base Attack.

Pictos.Name: Stay Marked
Pictos.Lumina: 50% chance to apply Mark when attacking a Marked target.

Pictos.Name: Stun Boost
Pictos.Lumina: 30% increased damage on Stunned targets.

Pictos.Name: Survivor
Pictos.Lumina: Survive fatal damage with 1 Health. Once per battle.

Pictos.Name: Sweet Kill
Pictos.Lumina: Recover 50% Health on killing an enemy.

Pictos.Name: Tainted
Pictos.Lumina: 15% increased damage for each Status Effect on self.

Pictos.Name: Teamwork
Pictos.Lumina: 10% increased damage while all allies are alive.

Pictos.Name: The One
Pictos.Lumina: Max Health is reduced to 1.

Pictos.Name: Time Tint
Pictos.Lumina: Energy Tints also apply Rush.

Pictos.Name: Versatile
Pictos.Lumina: After a Free Aim hit, Base Attack damage is increased by 50% for 1 turn.

Pictos.Name: Warming Up
Pictos.Lumina: 5% increased damage per turn. Can stack up to 5 times.

Pictos.Name: Weakness Gain
Pictos.Lumina: +1 AP on hitting an enemy's Weakness. Once per turn.
